General.Name: Shandong Lipeng Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Chiway Industry Development Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of aluminum anti-counterfeit bottle caps and composite anti-counterfeit printing aluminum plates. The company also offers aluminum anti-counterfeiting bottle caps, combined anti-counterfeiting bottle caps and composite anti-counterfeiting printed aluminum plates. In addition, it provides project and landscape planning and design, engineering construction, greening management, and forest planting, sand and gravel mining services. The company was formerly known as Shandong Lipeng Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Chiway Industry Development Co.,Ltd. in February 2021. Shandong Chiway Industry Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Yantai, China.
